title: Compare Your Connection With Lag Report

replies.body:
It's a cool tool, honestly, and I'm sure it'd be useful if there was actually data for my location :P

Is there a reason certain locations don't have data available, and will it be expanded more eventually to encompass those locations?

Can you let us know more info about your location and what information the tool shows you? 

Unfortunately, without knowing this it's difficult to give a useful answer.

They were very generic yes or no questions really, I wasn't asking for my area specifically, but generally for all areas lacking data, because I'm not really fussed about having it in my area, (I honestly probably won't use it beyond this, I was just curious about how the data available will be expanded) and I don't really want to say the suburb I live in online.  I will say I live in South West Sydney, and it detects my location as Hornsby in North Sydney (which really isn't near me lmao) and that every suburb around me has data but mine doesn't.

Under my results, when I go to give ISP and location feedback, when I select my suburb the tool just wants me to pick an alternate location because there is no data for my area. Kinda pointless to have a feedback button if it doesn't actually let me give feedback don't you think? If I try to view my suburb without the feedback button (by just picking a location to view that area) much the same it tells me there is no data and to pick an alternate location.

Umm, there is another comment here with the same issue I have, but when I press the link it just comes up with this:
Unrecognized Account
The Lag Report does not recognize this account. You may not have created created a Summoner Name yet.

Please login to the League of Legends game client and create a Summoner Name.

If you continue to encounter this error, please contact Riot Games Support.

[Here's an image](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B4sQjd7HpkzyeDkwY2lfcGRvbmM)

Update: Works on Safari but not chrome (I'm on mac)
I have the same issue, not sure what it means.
Can you try using a different browser and see if that fixes the issue?
Looks like there are some permission restrictions on the image you linked. Can you adjust the permissions such that anyone with the link can view? Thanks!

I'm just getting an "Unrecognized Account" Message, saying I might not have a summoner name yet and I need to log into the client to make one, but i've had my account since season 3 and it definitely has a summoner name.
Sorry about this. Can you post a full screenshot of what you're seeing?
EDIT: That was from Firefox. Tried on Chrome and it worked.
Ok, good to know. As I understand it, there is potential for ad or cookie blockers to cause issues with the site.

This is ZIGGS cool... which is obviously the best kind of cool. Thank You Boys and Girls for doing the Zeros and Ones thing... HOWEVER, there is an URGOT cool thing... There is no "Type of Connection" : Dial Up (lol), ADSL2, Malcolm's NB(roken)N, Fibre, Fixed Wireless or Satellite... That's so Urgot.
Lag Report suggests setting up QoS, but doesn't give you the details to set it up. I doubt many people have.. what are the ports etc ??
